title: Login page not loading
description: User reports that the login page shows a blank screen.

title: Payment failed error
description: Customer received an error message during checkout.

title: Forgot password link not working
description: The password reset link is redirecting to a 404 page.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Emails are being sent hours after the triggering event.

title: App crashes on startup
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after opening.

title: Profile update not saving
description: User cannot update their profile information.

title: Slow loading dashboard
description: Dashboard takes over 20 seconds to load.

title: Duplicate orders issue
description: Customers are seeing two identical orders after checkout.

title: Search function not returning results
description: Search bar shows no results even for valid queries.

title: Error 500 on settings page
description: An internal server error occurs when accessing the settings page.
